scoring_strategy: provide score 0 to 10 on following statements with 0 being low evidence and 10 being high evidence
question: The gene is associated with type I interferon responses
The gene is associated with type II interferon responses
The gene is associated with type III interferon responses
The gene is relevant to circulating leukocytes immune biology
The gene or its products are currently being used as a biomarker in clinical settings
The gene has potential value as a blood transcriptional biomarker
The gene is a known drug target
The gene is therapeutically relevant for diseases involving the immune system
